general.description:
This quite backyard world was the third and last Irmothem world to be colonized by sublight ships.
While colder than most rithai planets, its indigenous life is biocompatible at 90% with skaraean life and has given the Rithai quite a few domesticated species.
It has never been heavily populated, even for a First Wave Colony, and even now lies well below the billion people.
general.bar: A few Rithai trying to forget the lacklust world they live in
